title: Capitalization Rules Quiz
description: When should you capitalize a word? From proper nouns to titles, test your capitalization knowledge!

questions.question: Which is capitalized correctly?
options: I visited uncle bob last summer.
I visited Uncle bob last Summer.
I visited uncle Bob last Summer.
I visited Uncle Bob last summer.

questions.question: Should compass directions be capitalized?
options: Only at the start of a sentence
Only when referring to a specific region (e.g., 'the South')

questions.question: Should seasons be capitalized?
options: Only when used as proper nouns
No, seasons are not capitalized in standard usage

questions.question: Which title is capitalized correctly?
options: the old man and the sea
The old man and the sea
The Old Man and the Sea
The Old Man And The Sea

questions.question: Which is correct?
options: Both are correct depending on usage

questions.question: Should 'president' be capitalized in 'The president gave a speech'?
options: No, only capitalize when used as a title before a name
Only when referring to the current president

questions.question: Which is correct?
options: She is a Doctor at the hospital.
She is a doctor at the hospital.
she is a Doctor at the Hospital.
She is a doctor at the Hospital.

questions.question: Should days of the week and months be capitalized?
Which is correct in a letter?
Should you capitalize the word after a colon?
options: Only if what follows is a complete sentence (style varies)

questions.question: Should 'internet' be capitalized?
options: Only at the start of a sentence
No, it is now generally lowercase

questions.question: Which is correct?
options: I have a Bachelor's Degree in English.
I have a Bachelor's degree in english.
I have a bachelor's degree in English.
I have a bachelor's degree in english.

questions.question: Should you capitalize 'earth' in 'the earth revolves around the sun'?
options: Never capitalize earth, sun, or moon
Capitalize only when used as proper nouns without 'the'
Always capitalize Earth, Sun, and Moon
